question: The 15th edition of  International Dance Festival  "Udbhav Utsav" was held in which city?
explanation: The 15th edition of  International Dance Festival  \"Udbhav Utsav 2018\" was held in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh from October 20-25. It was inaugurated by Uzbekistan Ambassador to India Farhod Arziev. The main purpose of the competition-festival is to give opportunity to performers for creative communications, to present new talents and to facilitate acquaintance with pieces of national culture and arts in different countries.  The dance troupes from Bulgaria, Turkey and Sri Lanka, apart from 25 teams from India, participated in the event.
